article_title: Second assessment of Mohave County’s health is under way
article_text:
We're always interested in hearing about news in our community. Let us know what's going on!

Submit

article_metadata.author:
DOUG MCMURDO
Special to Today’s News-Herald

og.description: When Mohave County conducted a community health assessment in 2011, the idea was to put in the minimum effort needed to meet a requirement of the federal Affordable Care Act.
